title: Women in proportional or single-member district...

content.question: Describe the single-member, winner-take-all electoral system. Describe the proportional representation electoral system. Explain why a proportional representation system is likely to lead to the election of a greater number of women in parliament.

frqParts.text: Describe the single-member, winner-take-all electoral system. Describe the proportional representation electoral system. Explain why a proportional representation system is likely to lead to the election of a greater number of women in parliament.

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
